titles.title: Recognizing the employees of Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, the North Texas Commission, USO, and the people and businesses of North Texas for their dedication to the "Welcome Home a Hero" program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Ms. Johnson, E. B. asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/6/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Honors the employees of Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, the North Texas Commission, the United Service Organizations, Inc. (USO), and the people and businesses of North Texas for their valuable work with regard to the "Welcome Home a Hero" program. Expresses gratitude for their efforts to support our troops proudly serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
